description: {"blocks":[{"key":"pbrl","text":"Protocol on how to ship EV sample to the NCI Frederick core.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

ownership_history.name: Joshua A Welsh
ownership_history.affiliation: Translataional Nanobiology Section, Laboratory of Pathology, Center for Cancer Research, National Cancer Institute, National Institutes of Health

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3m58j","text":"If you are beginning a new project, you must put in a service request, select a CAN to draw funds from, and get approal from an AO, using the \"New Request\" button on the NCI Frederick EM Core's website: https://ncifrederick.cancer.gov/services/accessioning/services/labservices/area/5","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":203,"length":77}],"data":{}},{"key":"9k0le","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"47uea","text":"Pg 1: information about the request: fill out scope of work and number of samples","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dlcsb","text":"Pg2: select CCR investigator and tag emails of anyone you want to add as followers","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cb8ae","text":"Pg3: Daily Cruz-Abreu is the Fiscal Authority. Funding source is the current fiscal year Project ID number located on the “General Info and Links” tab of the lab OneNote page.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"B9C2EB15D82911EAA7500A58A9FEAC2A","url":"https://ncifrederick.cancer.gov/services/accessioning/services/labservices/area/5"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4hnbj","text":"Ensure that Ziqui Wang or Kunio Nagashima at NCI Frederick is expecting your package delivery, and you have had communication about what type of images you expect.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4mfqi","text":"Thaw the EV samples you intend to have imaged.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e2vo","text":"Transfer at least 50 µL of each of your sample to 0.5 mL tubes for shipment. It is possible as little as 35 µL could be imaged but any significant volume differences need to be discussed with the NCI core staff. Previously we have sent 100 µL per sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c1vjl","text":"Using a tube rack, other plastic supports, and tape, position the tubes in a plastic bag so that they are secure.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7eep9","text":"Place the tubes in a sytrofoam container with ice from the ice machine, not dry ice. Use a paper towel as a barrier between the ice and the samples so they don't partially freeze.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ag1j8","text":"Create an item list using this template and print a copy to be shipped inside the box.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ek3es","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"71onr","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d00fv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"file","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"19054620D82F11EAAC74739935C1E184","height":0,"id":72159,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"application/octet-stream","original_name":"2020-07-21 - Shipping key for EM.dotx","placeholder":"/img/extensions/file.png","source":"https://content.protocols.io/public/a18f59a1f81f8b771d2ad599e0be635a3b06872798174189afbbacff21aa85bb/cgq9bcma7.dotx","type":5,"width":0}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"89r8d","text":"Affix a To and From label on the top of the box: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f8a07","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"19i9n","text":"TO: Ziqiu Wang","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e3si6","text":" Electron Microscope Facility NCI-Frederick","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"emsg7","text":" EML at the ATRF","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7s8o4","text":" 8560 Progress Drive ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8n92i","text":"Wing D, Room D-2025 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e38pg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"376po","text":"FROM: Your Name","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8jkec","text":"Jones Lab","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cshn0","text":"Laboratory of Pathology","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4hh5","text":"10 Center Dr","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a68tm","text":"Bld 10, Rm B1B53","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7jdn5","text":"Bethesda MD,20892","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c8cbf","text":"The Frederick Courier no longer accepts requests via email or phone. You must use the Shipping Wizard to arrange pickup.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"af03f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c0tsh","text":"https://ncifrederick.cancer.gov/cad/shippingwizard","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2fv3v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9hh1h","text":"NCI Frederick Courier: 301-846-1175 (contact number only, do not call for pickup)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"v8n4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"41cbv","text":"Core Address:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"908gd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"940b3","text":"TO: Ziqiu Wang","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8l44l","text":"Electron Microscope Facility NCI-Frederick","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"81h9u","text":"EML at the ATRF","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"qgcq","text":"8560 Progress Drive ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4strf","text":"Wing D, Room D-2025 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2astm","text":"301-846-6064 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3g0lr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8tb0s","text":"You can wait for the courrier to knock on the lab door, or place the package with a note for the courrier outside the lab in the hallway.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"61gg1","text":"Email Ziqui and Kunio to let them know the shipment is on the way.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9cit8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cegmm","text":"nagashimak@mail.nih.gov","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dg5h0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"btgqg","text":"ziqiu.wang@nih.gov","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
